topics.body: thoughts about ZeroNet development - patched yet unreleased
topics.title: OneDrive blog

1@2.body:
I don't want to register a reddit nor a github account.
I leave here my patch for the 0.2.4 (stability improvement).
http://127.0.0.1:43110/13X3wTuczFgPYWWzGL5pwHsTrtMC2cuS9q
It does work. Please try http://zero.network:43110/ prefix. I fixed yet another bug since my last post.

1@45.body:
Plans for the weekend
* http://www.reddit.com/r/zeronet/comments/2vj4f3/now_that_we_have_the_ability_for_users_to_add/
* forget about json files
* use SQL as a key-value database
* introduce: torrent slices, rollback, if they are enabled
* anonymity ; distant plans
  * forget session: database in memory
  * forget frequently updated websites: why store them if they will be updated by tomorrow

Site updates v0.2.5
* upnp code doesn't work for all routers
* sql database is complete
* debug mode has a javascript bug
* forum works with the new code
